Summary: They manipulted the cloud canopy, multiple clouds at the same time.
divs: sighting detailsi first met the e.t. after they tranformed a large cloud directly over my head. though the wind was blowing the cloud no longer moved and stayed motionless above me. the 20 meter by 20 meter cloud about 100 ft above took the shape of an bald headed humanoid looking extra-terrestrial. looked down upon me and was very well defined. looking up at this, though surprizing, it was even more surprizing when the lips and mouth stated silently that he was an extra-terrestrial. i did'nt hear but could see completely, they were able to communicate with me without words. i mean they because he was not alone. many clouds then transformed into an array of extra-terrestrial beings standing up and hanging outside of their spacecraft(cloud) manipulating the clouds telepathically, simplistically.\ it was a grand show and it has'nt stopped there. i have been in communiction with more than one extra-terrestrial race for almost nine years. i am tired of being quiet. also one race of extra-terrestrials that are living here on earth and maybe right next door to you look just like humans. that is one of the main reasons (of many) why big brother likes to keep a lid. these look alikes and i don't get along to well, they are still somewhat covert and they're exact identitiies are not known by me at this time, but, my other extra-terrestrial friends know who every body is. the federal government will be told of this e- mail by these. i will send more later . i know many aliens.
